resources.string: Show the Cards before the Game
Welcome to the game! Use the tabbed bar at the top to navigate between home, the leaderboard and the game. Use the arrow buttons to show more information on how to play the game
Using the tabbed bar at the top of the application, navigate to the play section, highlighted here in red

On this page you can configure different settings for a game, such as the Number of Cards, Number of Lives, and a timer. All of these contribute to getting a higher final score. but the game can be played however you want

You can also configure if the cards should be shown before hand and if the cards should animate when playing. This can be useful for games with a timer or lives as this can speed up how long the game will take!
Now you have everything configured, the game can be started. Alternatively, if the settings are not right, you can reset and enter them in again
Once the game is started, you will be present with some cards facing down. Clicking on the cards will turn them face over
Matching two cards of the same type will remove them from the board, and increase your score
Continue matching cards until the entire board is cleared!
You can end the game at any time with the end game button
